LanguageData.ASF_SettingContentsTabSelection: Contents tab to display on adaptive storage buildings:
LanguageData.ASF_SettingContentsTabDescription: That's the tab saying 'Contents' on the bottom left panel with a building selected. 'None' displays contents in the vanilla way through 'Select x' gizmos on the bar to the right instead of tab.
LanguageData.ASF_MaxNumStacks: maximum number of stacks per cell
LanguageData.ASF_MaxNumStacksDesc: The maximum number of stacks that can go in a single space. Buildings two-cells large will have twice as much storage capacity.\n\nNote that other factors may reduce storage capacity.
LanguageData.ASF_StorageCapacityDescriptionCustomized: The maximum number of stacks fitting into this storage building for all cells combined.\n\n{sizeX} * {sizeZ} cells with individually set capacities.
LanguageData.ASF_StorageCapacityDescriptionStacksPerC: The maximum number of stacks fitting into this storage building for all cells combined.\n\n{sizeX} * {sizeZ} cells with a maximum capacity of {maxItemsInCell} stacks per cell.
LanguageData.ASF_AutomaticallyOpenContentsTabDescript: Selecting a storage building automatically opens its Contents tab with this enabled, or storage settings when empty.
LanguageData.ASF_HideLabelsZoomDescription: Affects labels shown on the map, like [ count ] or Item xY. Only show them at a close zoom level when enabled.
LanguageData.ASF_HideLabelsMouseOverDescription: Affects labels shown on the map, like [ count ] or Item xY. Only show them when pointed at with the mouse when enabled. Overridden by the Toggleable Overlays mod when having that mod enabled.
LanguageData.ASF_DefaultLabelStyleDescription: What to display for storage labels on the map. Individual buildings can override this in their config.
LanguageData.ASF_MaxZoomLevelDescription: The maximum zoom level to show labels for. They get hidden past this point.
